text: Tina ifavarir gumazim? Kar gumazir kamaghɨn mɨgeim, “Iesus, God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim puvatɨ.” Gumazir kam, a Kraisɨn apanim. An Afeziar Ekiam ko an Otarim akɨrim ragha aning gasara.(2:22) Akar otevir kam “Gumazir God Ua E Iniasa Mɨsevezim,” me Grighɨn akam kamaghɨn a dɨbora ghaze, “Krais.”
